puavo.admin.persistent_homedirs.description: Enable/disable persistent admin user home directories (stored under /state)

puavo.admin.primary_user.description: The user account of the primary user

puavo.admin.set_root_password.description: Set system root password from a password hash under /state (if it exists)

puavo.admin.superusers.description: System configuration mode for superuser permissions

puavo.admin.vpn.subnet.description: The subnet of the administrative vpn connection

puavo.audio.pa.alsa.sink.description: The ALSA playback output for Pulseaudio

puavo.audio.pa.alsa.source.description: The ALSA recording input for Pulseaudio

puavo.displays.forced.description: If true, force the monitors.xml display settings received from Puavo

puavo.graphics.driver.description: The display driver to use (leave blank to use the default)

puavo.grub.boot_default.description: The operating system to boot by default

puavo.grub.developer_mode.enabled.description: Enable/disable developer mode (use persistent image overlay)

puavo.grub.efi.force_extra_removable.description: If true, pass --force-extra-removable argument to grub-install

puavo.grub.windows.enabled.description: If true and Windows is installed, show it in Grub boot menu

puavo.guestlogin.enabled.description: Enable/disable guest login option on login screen

puavo.login.external.enabled.description: If true, do a double login, first to an external authentication service through Puavo, then normal login

puavo.networking.bootserver.interfaces.s.description: A space-separated list of network_interface:school pairs, where both sides may contain a comma-separated list

puavo.networking.dhcp.interfaces.description: List of network interfaces to use DHCP on (on systems without NetworkManager or manual configuration)

puavo.printing.cleanup_printers.description: A space-separated list of printer removal rules, use printer_state:seconds for each item

puavo.printing.jetpipe.enabled.description: Enable/disable Jetpipe (that passes devices to a network to enable printer sharing)

puavo.printing.servers.description: A space-separated list of cups servers to use

puavo.printing.ui.show_avahi_printers.description: If true, allow application to show Avahi printers directly

puavo.printing.use_puavo_permissions.description: If true, apply printer permissions as specified in Puavo, otherwise allow all printers for all users

puavo.service.cron.cronjobs.description: A comma-separated list of puavo-specific cron jobs to run

puavo.support.image_changelog_url.description: Changelog url, string replace done for IMAGESERIES, IMAGEVERSION, LANG and LSBCODENAME strings between double percent (%%) characters

puavo.support.new_bugreport_browser.description: The default web browser for opening a support ticket

puavo.support.new_bugreport_url.description: The URL for opening a support ticket, string replace done for DOMAIN, FQDN and HOSTNAME strings between percent (%) characters

puavo.support.remoteaccess.icons.allowed.description: The path for support icon (when remote access is allowed)

puavo.support.remoteaccess.icons.denied.description: The path for support icon (when remote access is disallowed)

puavo.support.show_accesscontrols_for.description: A comma-separated list of remote access methods to show access controls for, 'ssh' and 'vino' and possible options

puavo.support.ssh_access_timeout.description: Time in seconds for enabled remote ssh access, use 0 to disable remote ssh

puavo.support.vino_network_interface.description: The network interface where vino-server accepts connections

puavo.windows.image.sources.description: A whitespace-separated list of urls to fetch Windows-image catalogues

puavo.wired.nm.shared.enabled.description: Enable/disable network sharing on ethernet port

puavo.wireless.broadcom.driver.description: Set preferred driver for wireless Broadcom chips

puavo.wireless.nm.no_autoconnect_network.description: A JSON array of network names to which NetworkManager should not automatically connect to

puavo.www.homepage.description: The default web browser start page

puavo.xrandr.apply_presets.description: A comma-separated list of xrandr presets to apply, supports 'clone' and 'custom'

puavo.xrandr.args.description: A JSON array of xrandr args to run when setting up monitors, each string is split and run as a separate xrandr-command

puavo.xrandr.extra_modes.description: A comma-separated list of extra modes to setup, for example 1152x792 for a unique screen resolution, use 'auto' for automatic

puavo.xrandr.forced.description: If true, do not allow users to save their display settings

puavo.xrandr.mutter_permissions.description: A comma-separated list of permissions for settings up displays, may contain 'default', 'temporary' and 'user'

puavo.xsessions.alternative_languages.description: A space-separated list of language codes that can be chosen for desktop sessions

puavo.xsessions.locked.description: Enable/desktop desktop session type choice button on login screen

puavo.xsessions.cowsay.message.description: What does the cow say? (when puavo.xsessions.display_manager is set to puavo-darkdm-cowsay)

puavo.xsessions.default.description: The default desktop session (may also contain any non-Puavo desktop /usr/share/xsessions)
